Data.Description: Climatological annual average of high cloud cover over Greenland for CESM (left), ISCCP (middle; Rossow and Schiffer, 1999), and CLOUDSAT (right; Kay and Gettelman, 2009). The black solid lines denote the 0, 1000, 2000, and 3000 meter Greenland ice sheet elevation contours as seen by CESM.
Data.Title: High cloud cover over Greenland

Data.Description: Climatological annual average of low cloud cover over Greenland for CESM (left), ISCCP (middle; Rossow and Schiffer, 1999), and CLOUDSAT (right; Kay and Gettelman, 2009). The black solid lines denote the 0, 1000, 2000, and 3000 meter Greenland ice sheet elevation contours as seen by CESM.
Data.Title: Low cloud cover over Greenland

Data.Description: Climatological annual average of cloud cover over Greenland for CESM (left), ISCCP (middle; Rossow and Schiffer, 1999), and CLOUDSAT (right; Kay and Gettelman, 2009). The black solid lines denote the 0, 1000, 2000, and 3000 meter Greenland ice sheet elevation contours as seen by CESM.
Data.Title: Cloud cover over Greenland

Data.Description: Climatological monthly average of total high cloud cover over Greenland for CESM (red), ISCCP (green; Rossow and Schiffer, 1999), and CLOUDSAT (cyan; Kay and Gettelman, 2009).
Data.Title: Monthly total high cloud cover over Greenland

Data.Description: Climatological monthly average of total low cloud cover over Greenland for CESM (red), ISCCP (green; Rossow and Schiffer, 1999), and CLOUDSAT (cyan; Kay and Gettelman, 2009).
Data.Title: Monthly total low cloud cover over Greenland

Data.Description: Climatological monthly average of total cloud cover over Greenland for CESM (red), ISCCP (green; Rossow and Schiffer, 1999), and CLOUDSAT (cyan; Kay and Gettelman, 2009).
Data.Title: Monthly total cloud cover over Greenland

1
Jennifer E. Kay and Andrew Gettelman. Cloud influence on and response to seasonal arctic sea ice loss. Journal of Geophysical Research: Atmospheres, 2009. D18204. doi:10.1029/2009JD011773.

3
R. B. Rossow and R.A. Schiffer. Advances in understanding clouds from isccp. Bulletin of the American Meteorological Society, 80:2261–2287, 1999. doi:10.1175/1520-0477(1999)080<2261:AIUCFI>2.0.CO;2.

Description: An analysis of CESM's cloud cover over Greenland.
Title: clouds_cesm
